fda_announcement: The FDA acknowledges an emerging supply issue. We encourage manufacturers to voluntarily report any production concerns and stakeholders to monitor their supply chains closely.

The FDA is aware of an emerging drug shortage situation. We are actively monitoring the situation and coordinating with manufacturers to mitigate the impact. Healthcare providers should consider potential supply limitations and adapt practices to ensure continued patient care.
The FDA is aware of an emerging shortage of [Drug Name]. We advise manufacturers to coordinate efforts to increase production and encourage stakeholders to report supply chain issues.

The FDA is issuing a shortage alert for the affected drug due to emerging supply disruptions. We encourage manufacturers to review their production capacities and ask healthcare providers and suppliers to report inventory levels to facilitate coordination.
